text: SOUND HORIZON IS SIMPLY THE BEST!!! O AO I can't wait for this game to come out in America. ^ ^ I also hope that Revo's going to make more music, not only just for video games, but anything really. ; w; The music he makes is just simply a work of ART! I also suggest checking out his Sound Horizon albums like Moira, Roman, and Marchen. Not only are they great songs included in them, the songs in the album itself is very intricate and all of them are connected through the story they tell.

author: Vector

text:
Well, "bravely default" means to bravely take a step towards turning your back on your selfish promises and responsibilities, revealed in an interveiw with the game's designer.
I have no idea why it has "flying fairy" in the title though. My parents are just going to stare at me and question my sanity when I ask for a game called "bravely default: flying fairy" this cristmas.
author: Jirt

text:
Actually, sorry to say, but the enemies actually get HARDER as you level up. They level up with you, so if you grind to Lv.99, the enemies will get incredibly hard...
This game is soo difficult. I'm only halfway through it with about 17 crowns and everyone at level 60-or-so. I sure do hope they change it in the sequel...
author: Jirt

text: I agree, I think the Four Heroes of Light was a rather underrated game. I do hope they change the progressive difficulty with the levels, though- I ground up to level 99 for the final boss and it took me a loooong time to beat it. Not entirely sure how it worked, but it could be fixed, in my opinion.
author: B.D. Squires

text: It's prequel, FF:4HoL (Which, is one of the best RPGs on the DS in my oppinion, and definately one of the hardest) came out in America, so it's probably gonna come out here. I loved FF:4HoL, so I'm really looking forward to this release.
